question.stem: Which technology was developed most recently?
A student hypothesizes that algae are producers. Which question will best help the student determine if this is correct?

choices.text: Do algae use sunlight to make food?
choices.label: C

choices.text: Could an ecosystem survive without algae?
choices.label: D

question.stem: Soccer players use their muscle systems to kick a ball into a goal. What organ system coordinates the muscles?
Planets in the solar system are in constant motion. What factor has the greatest effect on the orbits of the planets?
How is a pond different from a lake?

choices.text: Ponds are not surrounded by land.
choices.label: C

choices.text: Ponds have a different amount of salt.
choices.label: D
